# ðŸŽµ Ballermanni Video Generator

**Disco-Dieter Musikvideo Workflow 3.1.0**

A comprehensive Google Apps Script system for managing AI-powered music video character generation using the Replicate API. This project automates character creation, scene tracking, cost analysis, and file organization through integrated Google Sheets and Google Drive workflows.

## ðŸš€ Features

- **ðŸŽ­ Character Management**: Complete character creation and tracking system
- **ðŸŽ¨ AI Content Generation**: Integration with Replicate API for image and video generation  
- **ðŸ“Š Cost Tracking**: Detailed analytics and budget management
- **â˜ï¸ Google Drive Integration**: Automated file organization and batch management
- **ðŸ”§ Automated Deployment**: Clasp-powered deployment pipeline
- **ðŸ“‹ Comprehensive Testing**: Manual test checklist and automated validation

## ðŸ—ï¸ Architecture

### Core Components
- **Google Apps Script**: Single JavaScript file with modular architecture
- **CONFIG System**: Centralized configuration management
- **Logger Class**: Structured logging (ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG)
- **ErrorHandler Class**: Standardized error handling
- **BatchOperations Class**: Performance-optimized batch processing

### Google Services Integration
- **Sheets API**: Multi-sheet project management system
- **Drive API**: Automated folder structure and file management
- **Properties Service**: Secure API token storage

## ðŸ“ Project Structure

```
ballermanni-video-generator/
â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ Code.js              # Main Google Apps Script file
â”œâ”€â”€ scripts/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ validate-syntax.js   # Pre-deployment syntax validation
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ run-tests.js        # Basic test runner
â”œâ”€â”€ Documentation/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ google-apps-script.md
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ replicate-api.md
â”œâ”€â”€ .clasp.json             # Clasp configuration
â”œâ”€â”€ package.json            # NPM configuration
â””â”€â”€ README.md
```

## ðŸ› ï¸ Setup & Deployment

### Prerequisites
- Node.js 14+
- Google account with Apps Script access
- Replicate API account and token

### 1. Clone Repository
```bash
git clone https://github.com/skquievreux/ballermanni-video-generator.git
cd ballermanni-video-generator
```

### 2. Install Dependencies
```bash
npm install -g @google/clasp
```

### 3. Authenticate with Google
```bash
clasp login
```

### 4. Create New Apps Script Project
```bash
npm run setup
```
*This creates a new Google Apps Script project linked to Google Sheets*

### 5. Deploy to Google Apps Script
```bash
npm run deploy
```

## ðŸ”§ Development Workflow

### Local Development
```bash
# Pull latest from Google Apps Script
npm run pull

# Validate syntax before deployment
npm run pre-deploy  

# Push changes to Google Apps Script
npm run push

# Open project in browser
npm run open
```

### Automated Deployment Pipeline
```bash
# Full build and deploy process
npm run build
```

This runs:
1. Syntax validation (`validate-syntax.js`)
2. Basic tests (`run-tests.js`) 
3. Deployment to Google Apps Script

## ðŸ§ª Testing

### Manual Testing
Follow the comprehensive test checklist in `MANUAL_TEST_CHECKLIST.md`:
- Basic functionality verification
- API integration testing
- UI component validation
- Error handling verification

### Automated Validation
```bash
# Run syntax validation
npm run pre-deploy

# Run basic tests
npm run test
```

## ðŸ“Š Google Sheets Structure

The system creates and manages 5 specialized sheets:

1. **Character Overview**: Character progress and batch management
2. **Scene Details**: Individual scene tracking with URLs and metadata
3. **Cost Tracking**: Detailed API usage and cost analysis
4. **Workflow Templates**: Reusable templates for different character types
5. **API_Config**: Secure API credential storage (hidden)

## ðŸ” API Configuration

### Replicate API Setup
1. Get API token from [Replicate](https://replicate.com/account/api-tokens)
2. In Google Sheets: `Setup & Tools` â†’ `API konfigurieren`
3. Enter token (format: `r8_...`)

### Supported Models
- **flux-schnell**: Primary image generation
- **consistent-character**: Character consistency across scenes
- **Video models**: Video generation from images

## ðŸ’° Cost Management

The system includes comprehensive cost tracking:
- Real-time API usage monitoring
- Per-operation cost calculation
- Cumulative budget analysis
- Cost optimization recommendations

## ðŸ” Troubleshooting

### Common Issues

**Syntax Errors**
- Ensure V8 Runtime is enabled in Apps Script
- Run `npm run pre-deploy` to validate syntax
- Check `SYNTAX_FIXES.md` for Google Apps Script compatibility

**API Authentication**
- Verify API token format: `r8_...`
- Check token permissions in Replicate account
- Test connection: `Setup & Tools` â†’ `API testen`

**Deployment Issues**
- Run `clasp login` to re-authenticate
- Verify `.clasp.json` has correct script ID
- Check `npm run logs` for deployment errors

## ðŸ“– Documentation

- **[Google Apps Script APIs](Documentation/google-apps-script.md)**
- **[Replicate API Integration](Documentation/replicate-api.md)**
- **[Manual Test Checklist](MANUAL_TEST_CHECKLIST.md)**
- **[Syntax Fixes Guide](SYNTAX_FIXES.md)**

## ðŸ¤ Contributing

1. Fork the repository
2. Create feature branch
3. Run tests: `npm run test`
4. Submit pull request

## ðŸ“„ License

MIT License - see LICENSE file for details

## ðŸ™ Acknowledgments

- Built with [Google Apps Script](https://script.google.com/)
- Deployed with [Clasp](https://github.com/google/clasp)
- AI generation powered by [Replicate](https://replicate.com/)
- Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

---

**Disco-Dieter Musikvideo Workflow 3.1.0** - Professional AI-powered music video production pipeline

packageJson.name: ballermanni-video-generator
packageJson.description: Google Apps Script for Disco-Dieter Musikvideo Workflow - AI-powered music video character generation and management system

scripts.build: npm run pre-deploy && npm run push

packageJson.author: Claude Code

analysis.description: Ballermanni Video Generator is an AI-powered, Google Sheetsâ€“driven pipeline that automates character, scene, and cost management for high-volume music video production. It turns messy, manual prompt creation and asset tracking into a structured, low-touch workflow tightly integrated with Google Drive and the Replicate API.

valueProposition: Automates AI music video character and scene generation end-to-end, replacing ad hoc prompts and file chaos with a structured, Google Sheetsâ€“based workflow.
Gives producers real-time cost visibility and budget controls for Replicate API usage, enabling predictable margins on AI-heavy productions.
Standardizes reusable templates and batch operations so small teams can scale to agency-level output without adding headcount or custom engineering.

customerSegments.name: Independent music producers and small labels using AI visuals
pain_points: Manual, error-prone management of AI prompts, scenes, and assets across tools and folders
Unpredictable API spend and difficulty understanding per-video cost structure

customerSegments.name: Creative studios and agencies offering AI-powered video packages
pain_points: High coordination cost to manage many characters, scenes, and revisions across multiple client projects
Lack of standardized workflows and reporting for AI asset generation and chargeback to clients

customerSegments.name: No-code/low-code teams in media companies building internal AI tooling on Google Workspace
pain_points: Need to orchestrate AI image/video generation within Google Sheets and Drive without dedicated engineering
Difficulty enforcing governance, logging, and cost tracking across experimental AI workflows

revenueStreams.source: SaaS subscription for hosted workflow template (Sheets add-on or Workspace app)
Per-seat or per-workspace licensing for agencies and studios
Professional services and custom workflow setup for larger media clients
